scripts.link-nhost: mkdir -p dist && cd dist && rm -rf nhost && ln -s ../nhost nhost
scripts.build: pnpm clean-functions && pnpm build-rollup && pnpm build-packagejson && pnpm build-packagelockjson && pnpm build-nhost-config && pnpm build-folders
scripts.build-nhost-config: mkdir -p dist/.nhost && cp -r nhost-config-template/data dist/.nhost/data && cp -r nhost-config-template/traefik dist/.nhost/traefik
scripts.build-folders: mkdir -p dist/.nhost/data && cd dist/.nhost/data && mkdir -p mailhog && mkdir -p minio && mkdir -p console-config
scripts.clean: pnpm clean-nhost && pnpm clean-js && pnpm clean-functions && pnpm clean-data && pnpm clean-others
scripts.clean-data: docker compose --file docker-compose.yaml --file docker-compose.overrides.yaml --project-name omnidata down --volumes
scripts.dev: pnpm link-nhost  && pnpm build && pnpm serve
scripts.serve: cp .secrets dist && docker compose --file docker-compose.yaml --file docker-compose.overrides.yaml --project-name omnidata up --detach
scripts.stop: docker compose --file docker-compose.yaml --file docker-compose.overrides.yaml --project-name omnidata down
